info.name: Omar Elweshy
info.Title: Software Engineer
info.summary: Backend-focused Software Engineer with 3+ years of experience delivering scalable solutions in fintech, blockchain, and web development. Expert in full-stack development, system optimization, and DevOps, with a strong track record of building robust backend systems, driving automation, and integrating complex APIs.

work.name: MetaCorp Agency
highlights: Developed and optimized MERN stack applications and RESTful APIs.
Led the integration of React/Next.js with blockchain systems (Ethereum, Solana) for Web3 communication.
Collaborated with frontend team for seamless integration.
Managed AWS deployments, setting up CI/CD pipelines that reduced deployment time by 50%.
Designed and deployed smart contracts for secure and efficient interactions with blockchain networks.
Tech stack: React.js, Next.js, Node.js, MongoDB, Docker, Jenkins, Solidity, GraphQL, AWS.

work.name: Waared
highlights: Led the seamless migration of logistics systems across servers, maintaining zero downtime and full data integrity.
Integrated logistics APIs (DHL, FedEx, Aramex, Saudi Post), which improved shipment tracking processes by 25%, streamlining customer operations.
Implemented a Celery & RabbitMQ-based messaging queue for asynchronous email and notifications, increasing system reliability.
Automated the invoicing system, reducing manual workloads by 40% and improving financial accuracy.
Implemented database backup procedures to ensure data security and quick recovery.
Tech stack: Django, PostgreSQL, Nginx, Celery, RabbitMQ, Docker, Jenkins, and Google APIs.

volunteer.position: VP Web Development section & Back-End Developer

education.institution: Higher Institute of Management and Information Technology

recommendations.name: James Chege (linkedin)
recommendations.reference: I recommend Omar as an outstanding Software Developer in Javascript/typescript, integrations and DevOps.
